content: this keychain buddy crochet pattern is a quick easy and useful keychain crochet pattern that you can make for anyone in your life the crochet keychain buddy can hold credit cards hand sanitizer earphones and so much more about this pattern - this crochet keychain buddy pattern is made with only basic stitches single_crochet chain and slip stitches - it is a very quick pattern you can make it in approx 30 minutes - it s great for using up your scrap yarn as you ll only need 30 yards of any kind of worsted weight yarn - it s a perfect gift for anyone everyone will love and actually use this crochet keychain buddy - the pattern includes step by step written instructions and a video tutorial
